name: classifiedsads
tag_list: classifieds-ads, classifieds, free-ads, classifieds-for-free, classified-free, free-classifieds-indian-classifieds, india-classified-ads, free-classified-ads, buy-sell-free-classified, classified-yellow-pages, indian-ads, post-free-ads, indian-advertiseme
overview:
Classifiedsads.co.in is the next generation of online free classifieds.

Classifiedsads.co.in provides a simple solution to selling, buying, trading, discussing, organizing, and meeting people near you, wherever you may reside.

Company Profile

Classifiedsads.co.in is India’s no.1 online free classifieds website .

Competitive Strength

The company bridges the gap between buyers and sellers by helping buyers find the right providers of products and services while helping sellers improve the efficiency of their marketing channels.

Key Highlights

The leading online free classifieds in India Large customer base and india coverage Highly searchable platform Excellent track record in user experience High customer satisfaction Modern infrastructure and constantly updated technology in online Experienced management team
